text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Over the next several days following<n>her race, I try
approaching Narita Brian<n>several times. However...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: There's nothing to talk about.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Scram.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
choice_data_list: She won't even give me the time of day!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Hey, it's that trainer. Pretty gutsy to<n>come again.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
That's the most persistent one<n>we've seen yet, huh? I'm
sure Brian<n>will say no, just like at the tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I've heard about Brian's tryout race.<n>The tryouts are
supposed to be where<n>racers attempt to get scouted, but
she<n>refused every offer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And when talk turns to making herdebut, she abruptly leaves withoutanother word. Maybe that'swhat she has a problem with...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Another few days later, I hear that<n>Narita Brian's going to
race again, so I<n>hurry over to see it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hraaagh!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Hishiama's really fired up today!<n>Like, we're talking a
whole 'nother<n>level!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Well, she's the one who suggested<n>they race, so she can't
afford to lo—<n>Whoa! Hishiama's making her move!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna... crush you! Wraaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Hup!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Wha?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Gah... Damn it! Aaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hold it!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Just where do ya think you're goin'?<n>Our battle isn't over. I
challenged you<n>to a one-on-one, best outta three.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: And I ain't losin' again! So get ready<n>for the next—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
The outcome's already decided. You<n>know full well that if
we race again,<n>the results'll be the same.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't want to see anyone's fire go<n>out anymore, much
less extinguish it<n>myself. I'm... sick of it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Damn it... I know, okay? I know I<n>can't beat you right now!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But... that doesn't mean I'm a quitter<n>who gives up after
one measly defeat.<n>Don't you dare go 'round assumin'<n>
you know what everyone's like!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
choice_data_list: She's just going to challenge you again.
She's just going to challenge you again.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...You again.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Didn't I tell you to scram? Don't let<n>me see you again.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Fine, I'll say it. Racers like that might<n>put on a tough front,
but once their<n>spirit's burned out, it ain't coming<n>back.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I've seen it a hundred times. There's<n>no point in me racing
them.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It wouldn't satisfy anyone.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: (It's always been like this. Ever since<n>back then.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: (When... I first felt this hunger.)

text_block_list.name: Young Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hurry up, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Young Brian
text_block_list.text: Coming!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(She was always ahead of me. I felt<n>like a wild animal on
the chase, but<n>she never let me pass her. It was the<n>most
fun I've ever had.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(I'd run and run... I'd keep running<n>and chasing after her...
But no matter<n>how satisfying it felt, I only wanted<n>more.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: (And then it happened.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Crash!

text_block_list.name: Young Brian
text_block_list.text: Sis? Sis, wake up. Sis... Sis!

text_block_list.name: Young Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ugh... Sorry, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wee woo, wee woo!
